title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast
Tuesday: Arena Series with Crim
Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: They Printed the Missing Piece to Goblins!  Aetherdrift #MTG Spoilers
videos.description:
We wrap up Aetherdrift spoilers with a look at the last mythic from the set, a Goblin that just might bring the tribe back in Standard, more support for the Dimir and Esper Self-Bounce deck and more! Let's discuss!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

#MTG #magicthegathering #aetherdrift #mtgspoilers 

0:00 Start
1:17 Coalheart Gerahulk
6:20 Howlsquad Heavy
10:21 Oviya, Automech Artisan
12:38 Gastal Thrillroller
14:40 Point the Way
16:12 Broodheart Engine
17:29 Fuel the Flames
19:12 Grim Bauble

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: 52 Surveil Lands  Against the Odds
videos.description:
What are the odds of winning with a deck that contains 52 surveil lands and just two playsets of non-land cards in Standard? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/against-the-odds-52-surveil-lands-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6865669#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/D4BI9
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/MdDRH

videos.title: Reanimator Vehicle, Discard Payoff, 08 Blue Legend  Aetherdrift MTG Spoilers
videos.description:
